column1: #: description: The nuclear modification factor for beauty-hadron decay electrons in 0--10% central Pb--Pb collisions at $\sqrt{s_{\rm{NN}}} = 5.02$ TeV. The rapidity of electrons for $p_{T} < 8$ GeV/c is |y| < 0.8 and |y| < 0.6 for $p_{T} > 8$ GeV/c.
#: keyword reactions: Pb-Pb --> b --> e X
